location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'PLAN TO ACCOMPANY THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THE GOVERNMENT OF BAHRAIN AND CABLE AND WIRELESS LIMITED.'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: A pencil number enclosed in a circle is located in the top right hand corner of the recto of the folio.Materials: 1 blue tracing sheetDimensions: 460mm x 420mm

mods.abstract: Plan accompanying signed agreement showing the area of land purchased by Cable and Wireless Limited and the protected area surrounding it to be leased by the company.Purchased plot shaded red. Protected area enclosed by red lines.Prepared in the Land Department, Bahrain. Signed by the Superintendent of the Land Department, Bahrain, 1 October 1936.
